action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mathematics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One and a half year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Java
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please follow my instructions. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please be specific now. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please think about it carefully. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE invalid after max attempts.

probes.question: ME: Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Does the recruiter know when you can start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
